definitions.definition: An organizer that papers are kept in, usually with an index tab, to be stored as a single unit in a filing cabinet .
examples: I keep all my schoolwork in a yellow folder .

definitions.definition: A virtual container in a computer 's file system , in which files and other folders may be stored . The files and subfolders in a folder are usually related .
examples: My essays are in the folder named "Schoolwork".

definitions.definition: A machine or person that folds things.
A folding knife , typically a pocketknife .
